name: 60 Seconds (LlamaJunior)
description:
You're a stock broker in the '90s trying to reach your daily quota. The company is crumbling, and you're using a dinosaur of a computer. Unfortunately, this precious computer is infected with malware. 

Can you track the unstable stock market and abuse its patterns?

How to Play :

Press "W" to buy stocks, and "S" to sell them. 

Click the "x" on ads to close them as quickly as possible and resume your trading.

Good luck, don't get fired.
